about_the_game:
Look, we know it's another zombie game, but...

We've shaken things up a little. Why's every zombie in a video game just a dude in a t-shirt and jeans? What happened to the delivery guys dropping off half-eaten orders of fries, or annoying gym trainers pushing flyers on you? You'll meet all sorts of zombiefied folks in our world, and you'll even be able to take a walk in their shoes (nose plugs sold separately)!

Struggle for survival in a truly expansive world, where...

Everything is simulated in a realistic manner. There's no need to dive into the wikis—your doomsday survival plan starts with common sense. One more thing: turns out that even the end of the world doesn't stop the weatherman from going to work. Keep an eye out for the forecast. You wouldn't want to get caught in the blood rain.

Chopping trees, mining ore, and chiseling tools? We've got everything you'd expect from a survival game, and...

So much more—every object in the game is a real thing that can be interacted with. If you're getting tired of the outskirts, brave the dangers of the city and head back home. Sit on that familiar table, do some reps with your favorite chair, and catch some fish in the toilet... Just like old times!

Who doesn't love customizing vehicles? We sure do, that's why...

We've added a huge range of vehicle customization options. Our focus group tells us that it's the dream of every gearhead to deck out the roof of their SUV with a vegetable garden and a giant mattress. If you want to be REALLY quirky, you could even mount a machine gun on it, but who'd want to do something like that in a zombie apocalypse?

You've got a mega graphics card? Well...

Plug that thing into a wooden stick to craft a tacticool nuka-hammer and blow up anything that stands in your way! Talk about "graphic violence"! You might be able to use wooden sticks for other things, too... who knows? Use your imagination to turn mundane objects into WMDs. The world is your oyster, couch warrior.

Got a lot of friends? More of a lone wolf? No matter—we've got a place for you!

Our team is full of multiplayer diehards and solo gamers. There's something for everyone here, no matter their star sign, blood type, or how they like their eggs in the morning.

Want to save the world, or are you looking to find a way out for yourself? Each player's personal story converges into one of many server endings.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

short_description: When the rain turned red, life forever changed. Horrors stalk a world that no longer belongs to us. To survive, you'll need to scour the land for resources and brave realistically-crafted infested cities. Unleash your creativity in an expansive open world with endless possibilities.

English*, Simplified Chinese*
